articles.title: Oil heads higher as Ukraine tensions escalate — price depends on what happens next - CBC.ca
articles.description: The potential for a war in eastern Europe has made energy prices volatile over investor fears that conflict between Russia and Ukraine could disrupt supplies.
articles.content:
